basics.summary: I am a software engineer who has experience in developing and maintain systems used by million of users. I consider myself as a detail and process oriented person. Learning and sharing have become my passion. I embrace for a new challenge and learning new things.

references.reference: I worked with Jeffrey for several years and during that always found Jeffrey to be a creative, humble and dedicated colleague. He is keen to learn and keen to apply his knowledge in any environment, always rising to the challenge put before him. When asked to take on large scale projects – such as the production of a series of gameplay – Jeffrey delivered without hesitation and with excellent execution, even if the projects were outside of his immediate role. I would highly recommend Jeffrey for his positive character as a member of any creative team.
